name: Little Whale Hungry
description:
Game Type

          Mobile 2D adventure games The adventure genre is the foundation of every game in the world.

          In this, the player must take on the role of a character in the game. Most of the adventure genres have a component. The action comes in, like Action Adventure. That has to go through various levels, including having to solve. Scene-based puzzles in a one-of-a-kind gameplay, Action and Adventure game.

          In itself, the highlight of this type of game is the design of the scene in 2D, forcing the character to walk sideways to the left. or right or top and bottom which the style of the 2D Side Scrolling

Story

          The story is about that the world has entered the high-tech era. There is a city dominant in the manufacturing industry. Robots and modern technology causing nature to be swallowed up Garbage is dumped into the sea in large numbers until birth Marine pollution problem Until one day, a group of townspeople who live on a natural island . The whale-like island sees the dark waves of pollution and trash move. The islanders have come together to create Robot Whale comes to the rescue waste disposal at sea The villagers believe that in the past, a whale named Blue DA saved the townspeople by Sacrificed their lives to become an island for them to live on until today. Therefore, the townspeople use whales as a model. The game will be a polluted marine area, murky sea water and garbage mixed with living things. Whales will eat garbage for destroys the marine debris and then purifies it as oxygen, bringing the black pollution in the sea back to clear. The rescue adventure begins.

Rules

- Players must move the character to hit the items that are sent out.

- Garbage must be collected within the level to unlock the next level.

- Within the level, there are items to add bonuses to help unlock the level.

- There are special items to help players pass the level.

- Players are not allowed to hit obstacles in the level with fish and rocks, otherwise it will cause damage.

- If the lowest player enters the dangerous area below, it receives damage.

Prepared by

Supacheep Nammungkhun
